What is content analytics? 
Content analytics methods allow discovering relevant 
knowledge and making sense of the continuously 
growing amount of unstructured data on the Web or 
within organizations, for the purpose of improved 
decision making.  
 
Content analytics methods use natural language 
processing (NLP), trend analysis, contextual 
discovery and predictive analytics to uncover patterns 
and trends across such unstructured content
